items.content_html: 📋 Angular Material & RxJS Observables are used to display my data. A Google Cloud Firestore NoSQL database stores the blog posts & Contact Form data. Anyone can read the blog posts. Angularfire-lite was used as a Firebase API wrapper as it is simple and lightweight, reducing Vendor bundle size & improving the Chrome Lighthouse score.
items.title: AndrewJBateman/angular-material-portfolio: :clipboard:  Angular Material & RxJS Observables are used to display my data. A Google Cloud Firestore NoSQL database stores the blog posts & Contact Form data. Anyone can read the blog posts. Angularfire-lite was used as a Firebase API wrapper as it is simple and lightweight, reducing Vendor bundle size & improving the Chrome Lighthouse score.

items.content_html: The JavaScript reference implementation of BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching and selective returns, and provides a modern alternative to REST.
items.title: jhuntdev/blest-js: The JavaScript reference implementation of BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching and selective returns, and provides a modern alternative to REST.

items.content_html: ZenNote is a lightweight and intuitive note-taking application designed for modern mobile devices. With a clean and minimalist user interface, ZenNote makes it easy to capture and organize your thoughts, ideas, and reminders on the go.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
